repairedDockerfile:

#    limitations under the License.
##############################################################################

# Create base container image to be used by all HPCC processes

ARG BUILD_LABEL
ARG DOCKER_REPO
FROM ${DOCKER_REPO}/platform-build:${BUILD_LABEL} as build
FROM ubuntu:20.04
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
RUN apt-get clean -y && \
    apt-get autoclean -y && \
    apt-get install -y -f && \
    apt-get autoremove -y && \
    apt-get update -y

RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
  default-jdk \
  g++ \
  git \
  git-lfs \
  openssh-client \
  libapr1 \
  libaprutil1 \
  libnuma1 \
  libboost-regex1.71.0 \
  libpython3.8 \
  libmemcached11 \
  libmemcachedutil2 \
  libmysqlclient21 \
  libxslt1.1 \
  locales \
  python \
  psmisc \
  r-base-core \
  zip \
  libarchive13 \
  libatlas3-base \
  curl && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ARG USE_CPPUNIT=1
RUN if [ ${USE_CPPUNIT} -eq 1 ] ; then \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y libcppunit-1.15-0; rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*; fi

# these are developer tools - we may want to move them elsewhere so that they are only in the incremental builds?

RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
    dnsutils \
    gdb \
    nano && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Set the locale
RUN locale-gen en_US.UTF-8
ENV LANG en_US.UTF-8 
ENV LANGUAGE en_US:en 
ENV LC_ALL en_US.UTF-8    

COPY --from=build /opt/HPCCSystems /opt/HPCCSystems
COPY --from=build /usr/local/bin/kubectl /usr/local/bin/kubectl

# NB: added in platform-build, but need to re-add as this image is not
# based on it. Only /opt/HPCCSystems is copied over.

RUN groupadd -g 10001 hpcc
RUN useradd -s /bin/bash -m -r -N -c "hpcc runtime User" -u 10000 -g hpcc hpcc
RUN passwd -l hpcc

RUN mkdir /var/lib/HPCCSystems && chown hpcc:hpcc /var/lib/HPCCSystems
RUN mkdir /var/log/HPCCSystems && chown hpcc:hpcc /var/log/HPCCSystems
RUN mkdir /var/lock/HPCCSystems && chown hpcc:hpcc /var/lock/HPCCSystems
RUN mkdir /var/run/HPCCSystems && chown hpcc:hpcc /var/run/HPCCSystems

USER hpcc
ENV PATH="/opt/HPCCSystems/bin:${PATH}"
ENV HPCC_containerized=1
WORKDIR /var/lib/HPCCSystems
RUN eclcc -pch
